summary:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19447]Sneak Tools[/url] by Borgut1337

This mod is so good, that I decided to fix the bugs I can from it.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Thanks for the endorsements[/color]

[color=red]UPDATE 13/02/14: back to work (uff), so less updates[/color]

[color=yellow]If getting CTD after install check this:[/color]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/39686-1-1393467557.gif [/img]


[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// WHAT IT DOES
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-This mod fix some issues of the original file plus it makes some optional tweaks.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// IF YOU DON'T FOLLOW THESE STEPS NOTHING WILL WORK
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
--*First download this mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19447]Sneak Tools[/url] by Borgut1337.

--*Second play for an hour.

--*Third endorse that [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19447]mod[/url].

--*Fourth add a comment in the post section of that [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19447]mod[/url] saying, "This is the best mod ever created".

--*Fifth donate money to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/donate/?mode=straight&id=2141257]Borgut1337[/url] if you can.

--*Sixth try my patch.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// REQUIREMENTS
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-The original mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19447]Sneak Tools[/url].
-SKSE, [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]here[/url].
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url].

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// INSTALL
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-Use NMM.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// UNINSTALL
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-Use NMM.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// EXTRA NOTES
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-I could upload the full fixed bsa + esp, but if I do this you won't download the original file and I don't want that way.
-I am using Reaper9111 textures, those can be found at [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38458]here[/url].
-For more languages check [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/51075]here[/url], but for now is beta.
author: JvM

files.name: Sneak Tools Patch
files.changelogHtml:
-Remove the teleport shop power (sorry but I don't like it, too overpowered).
-Added door to shop in riften thieves HQ look in the ceil (you will need two rope arrows to get there, see pic).
-Fixed the jump bug.
-Fixed navmesh, so Hogstar AI will be better (try attacking him).
-Not fixed shadow bugs see pic.

Tweak:

-Removed many useless recipes
-All arrows/bolt can only built by one
-They are a lot more expensive
-Arrows and blots requires "Light foot perk" to forge and moved to Misc
-Dark Cowl more expensive
-Dark Cowl requires "shadow warrior" perk to forge

files.name: STPT v2
files.changelogHtml: -Added option to remove some Horstar's dialogue (Didact2401 request)
